entry.def: If you describe someone as dumpy, you mean they are short and fat, and are usually implying they are unattractive.

means.word_mean: 1. short and thick; as e.g. having short legs and heavy musculature;

sentences.sentence: "some people seem born to be square and chunky"
"a dumpy little dumpling of a woman"
"dachshunds are long lowset dogs with drooping ears"
"a little church with a squat tower"
